      public boolean removeFloorPerson​(int id)
      Removes a person based on their id number.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID number of the person that should be removed from the floor.
      Returns:
      boolean This returns true if the person was removed, false if the person wasn't removed.

    • tick

      public int tick​(int currentTick, int maxTick)
      Tick method to keep the floors running in sync with the rest of the building.
      Parameters:
      currentTick - The current tick.
      maxTick - The max tick.
      Returns:
      int This indicates which of the two if statements within the function were able to be executed. (For testing purposes)
